A4.text: Louverture was born as a slave in the French colony of Saint-Domingue, now known as Haiti.

A5.text: Louverture is thought to have been born on the plantation of Br√©da at Haut-du-Cap in Saint-Domingue, where his parents were enslaved and where he would spend the majority of his life before the revolution.

A6.text: Toussaint Louverture was reportedly of Arada heritage.
